00001 using System;
00002 using System.Collections;
00003 using System.ComponentModel;
00004 using System.Data;

00008 using System.Web.UI;
00009 using System.Web.UI.WebControls;
00010 using System.Web.UI.HtmlControls;
00011 
00012 namespace PMT.Client
00013 {
00017     public class Projects : System.Web.UI.Page
00018     {
00019         protected System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid DataGrid1;
00020         string clientID;
00021     
00022         private void Page_Load(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
00023         {
00024             clientID = Request.Cookies["user"]["id"];
00025 
00026             if (!Page.IsPostBack)
00027             {
00028                 // show the projects datagrid
00029                 DBDriver db = new DBDriver();
00030                 db.Query = 
00031                     "select p.ID as projectID, p.Name as projectName, u.ID as managerID, u.userName as managerName\n"
00032                     + "from projects p, users u, clients c\n"
00033                     + "where p.ID = c.projectID\n"
00034                     + "and u.ID = c.managerID\n"
00035                     + "and c.clientID = @clientID;";
00036                 db.addParam("@clientID", clientID);
00037 
00038                 DataSet ds = new DataSet();
00039 
00040                 db.createAdapter().Fill(ds);
00041             
00042                 DataGrid1.DataSource = ds;
00043                 DataGrid1.DataBind();
00044             }
00045         }
00046 
00047         #region Web Form Designer generated code
00048         override protected void OnInit(EventArgs e)
00049         {
00050             //
00051             // CODEGEN: This call is required by the ASP.NET Web Form Designer.
00052             //
00053             InitializeComponent();
00054             base.OnInit(e);
00055         }
00056         
00061         private void InitializeComponent()
00062         {    
00063             this.Load += new System.EventHandler(this.Page_Load);
00064 
00065         }
00066         #endregion
